name: P.O.S
description:
Context

P.O.S (Protect, Obey, Serve) is a Windows game made during a student game jam where the theme was "Save the world not yourself"

We hope you'll enjoy our game and every feedback are appreciated !

Commands

-> Deplacement: (Left, Right) or left gamepad

-> Transform to bumper: D or gamepad bottom button

-> Transforrm to block: Q, A or gamepad left button

-> Explosion: S or gamepad right button
